column3: Does the Named Insured permit Bear River Mutual to request his or her insurance score?
Has any insurer, including Bear River Mutual, declined, canceled (other than for non-pay), or non-renewed the insured for any reason?
Has any named insured or household member been convicted of arson or fraud?
Is home for sale or vacant?
Has there been a lapse in coverage on this property?
Is this home ever rented (including Airbnb, VRBO, etc.)?
Is there business or farm/livestock operations on the premises?
How many dogs are kept on the premises?
List the breed of each dog and any history of aggressiveness

Does the named insured own or board any of the following dogs? Akita, American Mastiff, Chow Chow, Doberman Pinscher, Pit Bull, Presa Canario, Rottweiler, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Wolf Hybrid, or mixed breeds of these types?
Does the named insured own or board any unusual, exotic, rare, or ferocious animals?
Is the property difficult to access by fire or police departments?
Aside from the named insured or spouse, are there any additional names that appear on the title of the home?
Does the applicant reside at the premises?
Is there more than two families or more than one roommate living at this property?
Have you or any member of your household consumed any alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs, or illegal substances in any form or in any amount within the last 3 years?

Have you or any member of your household been arrested or convicted of driving under the influence of alcohol, illegal drugs, or illegal substances in any form or in any amount within the last 3 years?
Has the applicant had continuous coverage for the prior 6 months?
Has any insurance coverage for you or any member of your household been declined, canceled, or non-renewed in the last 3 years?
Does this driver have 2 years of USA or Canada driving experience? If no, please explain.
Does this driver work with any ridesharing or delivery services?
Does the driver reside outside of the primary address?
Does the vehicle have any existing damage?
Is this vehicle registered in the State of Utah?
Is this vehicle titled and registered to only the Applicants and unmarried youthful children listed on the policy?
